desc: Lovely Tales books start with the book series Lulu Bakes by Iris Melendez and young illustrator Abigail Melendez. They bring humorous and entertaining stories as well as their passion for baking by sharing recipes in the books. Bakers of all ages can enjoy baking tutorials on their YouTube channel Lovely Tales.

layout.text: We're a mother-daughter duo sharing our passion for storytelling and baking one lovely tale at a time.
